title: FontLab and mapping
content:
New here, and new with font-design…

I have some problems of mapping when I generate a new font (with FONTLAB), the special characters/accents are not on the correct key.  
What I have to do?
author: mee

comments.content:
Wow, I’ve never been IMed with a plea for help before…

Did you design a full character set?

What program are you using to test this?

Unfortuantely, I’m not the best person to help, but I’ve run into similar problems myself a time or two…  
\_\_  
 [www.typeoff.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826123125/http:/www.typeoff.de/)

I meant, what program are you doing the _testing_ in. The program in which you type text in, and the font’s glyphs do not map properly? (Word, InDesign, Quark, etc).

\_\_  
 [www.typeoff.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826123125/http:/www.typeoff.de/)
Your operating system is also important to know. Have you aksed fontlab for help?
